title: Square WatchFaces
summary: THIS NEEDS ZOOPER WIDGET PRO TO WORK. only to be used on Android wear watches
description: Requirements:1) Have Android Wear watch.2) Have Zooper Widget Pro.3) Wearable Widgets.NOT STAND Alone APP! If you have issues look in the description! Welcome to Android Square Zooper for Android Wear Watches. This app is designs solely for the android watches. 2 Versions have been made. 1 is a digital feature packed clock with notifiers to your Phone, SMS, battery, weather, and more. The 2nd is an Analog clock that is more basic with info to weather. battery, date, and time.Sadly with out any control of my own some times the widgets  don`t like to play nice with the devices there is a fix for this but you will have to email me because it cant be done without me working the issue myself.I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO FIX EVERY ISSUE WHEN ASKED TO FIX THE PROBLEMHow to setup:1) Download the app 2) Open Wearable Widgets and go to settings and select use as watch fsce3) Create A New Widget 4) Scroll Down to Zooper Widget and Select Grid Size 4X3 5) Select The Widget You Want To Use6) In the zooper settings go to global preferences.7)Scroll down and select standby updates. (this will allow you to recieve time and other watch updates when phone screen is turned off)8) Back out until you are in wearable widgets again and go to wearable widget settings.9) Go to wear watch face settings and turn off show notification underlay.10) On your watch long press on your current watch face and then scroll until you find the widget you chose. 11)enjoy
descriptionHTML:
Requirements:
1) Have Android Wear watch.
2) Have Zooper Widget Pro.
3) Wearable Widgets.

NOT STAND Alone APP! If you have issues look in the description!


Welcome to Android Square Zooper for Android Wear Watches. This app is designs solely for the android watches. 2 Versions have been made. 1 is a digital feature packed clock with notifiers to your Phone, SMS, battery, weather, and more. The 2nd is an Analog clock that is more basic with info to weather. battery, date, and time.

Sadly with out any control of my own some times the widgets don`t like to play nice with the devices there is a fix for this but you will have to email me because it cant be done without me working the issue myself.

I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO FIX EVERY ISSUE WHEN ASKED TO FIX THE PROBLEM

How to setup:
1) Download the app
2) Open Wearable Widgets and go to settings and select use as watch fsce
3) Create A New Widget
4) Scroll Down to Zooper Widget and Select Grid Size 4X3
5) Select The Widget You Want To Use
6) In the zooper settings go to global preferences.
7)Scroll down and select standby updates. (this will allow you to recieve time and other watch updates when phone screen is turned off)
8) Back out until you are in wearable widgets again and go to wearable widget settings.
9) Go to wear watch face settings and turn off show notification underlay.
10) On your watch long press on your current watch face and then scroll until you find the widget you chose.
11)enjoy
comments: Simple & clean! If you're looking for a Watch Face that gives you more functionality than what comes with Wear devices, check this one out.
recentChanges: New clocks added and a new set of weather backgrounds for when it snows and when it rains.
